title: ‘Fortnite' creator Epic Games valued at $31.5 billion after latest round of funding
text:
Epic said Monday that Sony and Kirkbi each invested $1 billion in its latest round of funding.

Don't miss:California attorney general jumps into Epic-Apple antitrust battle

The company, which also counts Walt Disney Co. DIS and China's Tencent Holdings Ltd. TCEHYHK:700 among its investors, was valued at $28.7 billion as of last April. Its chief executive, Tim Sweeney, remains the company's controlling shareholder.

The company said the funding will advance the company's aims to build the metaverse — a term used to describe a virtual environment in which people can use digital avatars to work, play and shop — and its continued growth.
